content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'm definitely going to take my violin to a luthier to get it serviced and restrung. I've had it for a while, and I'm not sure when the last time was that it was properly set up. By the way, speaking of guitars, I've been experimenting with music production software, Ableton Live, using my Taylor GS Mini to create some basic loops and tracks. Do you have any tips on how to get started with recording and producing music on a computer?
